titleStmt.title: The coppy of two letters from Sr. Thomas Rowe Lord Embassador Extraordinary for His Majesty in Germany. One to the Earle of Holland. The other to Mr. Edward Waller, one of the Members of the House of Commons. Concerning the French Embassadors accusation against him in the House of Peeres.
titleStmt.author: Roe, Thomas, Sir, 1581?-1644.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
